description: An island inhabited entirely by the Kuja tribe, a society of warrior women. Men are strictly forbidden from the island, and those who arrive are sentenced to death.

keyEvents.title: Luffy's Trial
keyEvents.description: Luffy is brought to trial in the Amazon Lily arena for the crime of being a man on the island.
keyEvents.significance: Demonstrates the strict laws and cultural practices of Amazon Lily.

keyEvents.title: Marguerite and Friends Petrified
keyEvents.description: Three Kuja warriors are turned to stone by Hancock as punishment for helping Luffy.
keyEvents.significance: Shows the harsh justice system of Amazon Lily and Hancock's ruthless enforcement.

name.japanese: アマゾン・リリー闘技場

description: A large gladiatorial arena in Amazon Lily where executions and trials take place. The Kuja warriors gather here to witness judgments and combat.

keyEvents.title: Arena First Appearance
keyEvents.description: Luffy is brought to the Amazon Lily arena for his trial and execution.
keyEvents.significance: First appearance of the execution arena, establishing it as the site of Amazon Lily's justice system.

keyEvents.title: Marguerite's Confession
keyEvents.description: Marguerite confesses in the arena to helping Luffy, leading to her punishment.
keyEvents.significance: The arena serves as the setting for this tragic moment.

keyEvents.title: Luffy vs. Bacura
keyEvents.description: Luffy defeats the execution panther Bacura in the arena with a single punch.
keyEvents.significance: First combat in the arena, showcasing Luffy's strength to the Kuja tribe.

keyEvents.title: Battle vs. Gorgon Sisters Begins
keyEvents.description: The arena becomes the battleground for Luffy's fight against Boa Sandersonia and Boa Marigold.
keyEvents.significance: Sets up the major battle that continues in the following episodes.
